title: Cloak Defense
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship thwarts an undead assault
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship deceives scrying eyes by pretending to steal the Cloak of Rainbows and leaving in false disgrace.
They secretly return to the palace and endure a tense night before learning of a devastating attack on the western border.
In a pre-dawn battle, the Fellowship defends Chief Lubash and the Cloak of Rainbows against Kadmos and his minions.
Seeker saves Lubash by using dimension door, and Delwath's spells play a crucial role in thwarting the enemy.
Kadmos is executed and his allies are imprisoned in the mirror after a narrow victory.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship successfully safeguards the Cloak of Rainbows from Kadmos's forces after a deceptive ploy and a fierce battle.
